title: Irish Fairy and Folk Tales by William Butler Yeats (Modern Libra
description:
Gathered by the renowned Irish poet, playwright, and essayist William Butler Yeats, the sixty-five tales and poems in this delightful collection uniquely capture the rich heritage of the Celtic imagination. Filled with legends of village ghosts, fairies, demons, witches, priests, and saints, these stories evoke both tender pathos and lighthearted mirth and embody what Yeats describes as Ã¢â‚¬Å“the very voice of the people, the very pulse of life.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½
